mapper.update: update role_menu set role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, read = #{read,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create = #{create,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update = #{update,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete = #{delete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where role_menu_id = #{roleMenuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select role_menu_id, role_id, menu_id, menu_name, read, create, update, delete, state from role_menu
